description:
The Chinese language includes over 200 radicals used to form over 40
thousands characters that can be combined to create almost 100 thousands
words. Then there are tones, classifiers, homophones, multiple
pronunciations for each character, traditional and simplified variants,
different kind of romanization… it’s no wonder that Chinese is
considered one of the most difficult languages to learn.

However Chinese is actually pretty easy and during this talk you will
learn more about this beautiful language and how I’ve been learning it
with the help of Python.

in \_\_on **sabato 21 aprile** at 15:30 `**See
schedule** </p3/schedule/pycon9/>`__
title: A journey into the Chinese language with Python
